ComicInfo.Title: Death In NYC
ComicInfo.Summary:
Death in NYC
Death Force is on an unexplainable rampage in NYC. Robyn fights to protect her home turf, stop Death Force from hurting innocent people, and solve the mystery of his madness. But revenge comes in many shapes and sizes and, in this case, with the power of a dragon!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Riveiro & Grostieta | 1 | B | Cover B | Marc Rosete & Erick Arciniega | 2 | C | Cover C | Allan Otero & Ceci de la Cruz | 3 | D | Cover D | Jose Luis & Mohan Sivakami | 4 | E | In-Store Exclusive Cover, Limited to 100 | Paul Green | Missing | F | Secret Retailer Exclusive Cover | Paul Green | Missing | G | Cosplay Exclusive Cover, Limited to 350 | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | Missing | H | Emerald City Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Jamie Tyndall & Ula Mos | Missing |
